name: First Taste VR
description:
WARNING: This experience contains adult content. You must be 18 years old or older to proceed. All characters depicted are 18 years old or older.

Welcome to First Taste! a fantasy VR CGI experience. Whenever Lilith gets board she will often come down to the local town to find a decent guy to be her play thing, could it be you this time? Think you can handle a succubus? Dive into virtual reality and experience it first hand see if you can satisfy Lilith’s lust! She might appear sweet at first, but don't let that fool you, if she gets too excited you might experience what its like to be dominated by a succubus!

Fully voice acted and over 20 minutes of VR lewdness. Have Lilith tease and whisper into your ear with ASMR voiced Oolay Tiger!
